summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1160, for the improvement of Thirtieth Avenue, from the north line of White's Addition to the City of Seattle to East Union Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary wooden curbs gutters and crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 12929 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
